setIterationsPerStep(int) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.ca.rps.models.Terrain
Sets the number of low-level iterations to be performed in each high-level execution step – i.e.
setNeighborhood(Terrain.Neighborhood) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.ca.rps.models.Terrain
Sets the Terrain.Neighborhood instance to be used in selecting pairs of adjacent inhabitants of the terrain.
setRng(Random) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.ca.rps.models.Terrain
Sets the instance of Random to be used as the RPS system's source of randomness, for randomness.
setSize(int) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.ca.rps.models.Terrain
Sets the size (height and width) that will be used for creation of the terrain lattice in the next execution of Terrain.initialize().
setSource(Breed[][]) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.ca.rps.views.TerrainView
Specifies a 2-dimensional array of RPS Breed instances, for use in drawing.
step() - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.ca.rps.models.Terrain
Update the state of the system by performing Terrain.getSteps() iterations of random pair selections and resolution of RPS interactions between the members of the selected pairs.
